posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone!

I am looking to move my T207 set ahead a little. I don't mind RAW but slabs seem to be my fate with this set. I am looking for SGC 35/50 or PSA 2.5/4 #0 and 2.5 will work if they aren't the ugliest examples to receive those grades:D

Thanks in advance to all who may respond

Here is a list of a few that I am looking for.

James Austin (no insignia on shirt)        
Ping Bodie            
Max Carey        
Leonard Cole                   
Claude Derrick            
Ray Fisher (blue cap)        
William Lawrence Gardner        
Lefty George        
George Graham        
Olaf Henriksen        
William Hogan        
Armando Marsans        
Mike Mitchell (Cincinnati)        
George Mullin ("D" on cap)        
George Mullin (no "D" on cap)        
Herbert Northen                   
Herbert Perdue        
Napoleon Rucker        
Wilbur Schardt        
Frank E. Smith (Cincinnati)        
Harry Lee Spratt        
Edward Stack        
George Stovall        
William Sullivan        
Bert Tooley        
Stanley Yerkes

Hey Mike,

I have a few available T207s on your list.  Most though are outside your desired grade range... will follow up via email with specifics.

--
Mike
